Breadth-First.Explanation: Initial open-ended observation and broad clue listing without any hypothesis
Continued broad enumeration of architectural clues without converging on a specific location hypothesis
Further broad clue collection of natural elements, still no hypothesis generation

Depth-First.Explanation: Convergent reasoning: derives and confirms the hypothesis of Portugal/Porto based on key azulejo tilework clue
Depth-First.KeyElement: Extensive blue-and-white azulejo tilework indicating Portuguese/Porto architecture

Depth-First.Explanation: Focused plan to verify and refine the Porto hypothesis by seeking specific building information
Depth-First.KeyElement: Specific buildings with extensive azulejo tilework in Porto

Breadth-Depth Switch.Explanation: After gathering broad clues, the reasoning shifts to generating and verifying a concrete location hypothesis
